overview: Aspiring filmmaker So Yee is working part-time on a movie set. There, she runs into Kyung Min, her ex-girlfriend and the lead actor of the one movie she has made. So Yee tries to avoid Kyung Min, but it is hard to do so while being a camera assistant. A short film about avoiding ex-girlfriends, trying to read the director's mind, and struggling to eat at the movie set.
title: Action!
